The embodiment of your story through the: Воплощение вашей истории через искусство движения
Танцевально-спортивный клуб Форум был ос: The Forum Dance and Sports Club was founded in 2017 by outstanding dancers and coaches, world champions, European champions, multiple finalists and winners of the Russian Championship Anton Aldaev and Natalia Polukhina. In 5 years, the Forum has grown from one hall to a whole network of branches in all districts of the city of Rostov-on-Don and other cities of the region. The coaching staff creates comfortable conditions for classes and finds an individual approach to each athlete within the framework of a structured training system. The groups are divided into children from 3 years old, athletes and adult beginners (solo Latin). Thanks to this division, our club is open to dancers of any age and level. Also, one of our main goals is to promote sports ballroom dancing as an art form. The culture of movement instills plasticity and elegance in a person, and fills the world of dance with energy and spirituality. Having entered these doors once, it is impossible not to want to return. Our task is only to help discover this special life for ourselves!
